main event: Civilians driving along Route 1 near Media, Pennsylvania, observed a bright light moving rapidly across the sky on November 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright, resembling a star., It was moving at approximately 5-20 times the speed of ordinary aircraft., The observers noted the object was at a very high altitude., A report from a witness named Raymond Reber detailed an oval-shaped, silvery object moving silently., The object changed direction and accelerated away quickly.
